Question: This person has also shot for WHIRL magazine and the North Shore Animal League.
Hints: This person was hired full-time in 1977 and worked a four-hour midday shift, six days per week on a $96 weekly salary.
This person ran for 11 years until the last taped episode aired on July 8, 2005.
This person released the program on VHS in early 1994 as This person's New Year's Rotten Eve 1994.
